strapiArticles.title: Mac上安装Nginx！
strapiArticles.description: 怎么在macOS系统上安装Nginx？可以使用Homebrew快速安装Nginx。
strapiArticles.content:
##### 一、Mac 上安装 Nginx

###### 1、安装 Homebrew

先安装 Homebrew(MacOS的软件包管理器)，已安装可以忽略此步骤：

```bash
# 打开终端，复制下面代码到终端，回车执行即可
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
```

---

###### 2、安装 nginx

```shell
brew install nginx

# 安装成功后，会有如下输出，显示Nginx的目录和端口信息
==> **nginx**
Docroot is: /usr/local/var/www

The default port has been set in /usr/local/etc/nginx/nginx.conf to 8080 so that
nginx can run without sudo.

nginx will load all files in /usr/local/etc/nginx/servers/.

To restart nginx after an upgrade: brew services restart nginx
Or, if you don't want/need a background service you can just run: /usr/local/opt/nginx/bin/nginx -g daemon off;
```

---

###### 3、相关目录和命令

```shell
# 网站部署目录
/usr/local/var/www

# Nginx 安装目录，可以修改配置文件
/usr/local/etc/nginx/

# Nginx启动命令
nginx

# Nginx重启命令
nginx -s reload
```

---

###### 4、强制关闭Nginx

- 查看 Nginx 的进程

```
$ ps -ef | grep nginx

# 输出如下：
501  9656     1   0  3:18PM ??         0:00.00 nginx: master process nginx
501  9657  9656   0  3:18PM ??         0:00.01 nginx: worker process
```

- 杀掉主进程（nginx: master）

```
kill -9 9656
```
